root.name: Left Behind: Eternal Forces
root.description: OverviewLeft Behind: Eternal Forces is a 2006 PC game based upon the popular Left Behind series of Christian novels. It is a real time strategy game in which the player must battle the forces of the Antichrist and try to convert people to Christianity. The game attracted a fair amount of controversy as Muslims and people of similar beliefs were used as enemies in the game. Several Christian groups boycotted Eternal Forces and attempted to get Wal-Mart to do the same.
